name: Coothemes Icons
author: Coothemes.com Team

sections.description:
Coothemes Icons plugin helps to insert icons into post and pages on your website. Access any icon of more than 2,000.

Features

*Over 2,000 icons included
*Insert Icons Directly Into Posts/Pages
*No need to write a single line of code
*Actively under development

Basic Plugin Demo
Check Out Free Version Demo

Additional Features in Pro Version!
Pro Features

Easily customize icon size, color, link and more without writing any code!
*Upload unlimited custom icons!
*Many animation effects for your icons
*Easily generate an icon container to use on your website (with awesome hover effects)
*Premium support for any problem you may have with the plugin, or something more custom you’d like to achieve
*Built in widget support for *all icons
*No need to write a single line of code manually in the pro version
*Actively under development

Get the premium version now!

Pro Plugin Demo
Check Out Pro Version Demo
sections.installation:
1. Upload coothemes-icons.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the ‘Coothemes Icons’ plugin page in the dashboard
  4. Click on which icon you would like to use
  5. A preview of the icon will then appear in the preview box at the top. You can either copy the generated shortcode, or click on ‘Insert Icon’ (if on the post or page edit screens)
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload coothemes-icons.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the ‘Coothemes Icons’ plugin page in the dashboard
  4. Click on which icon you would like to use
  5. A preview of the icon will then appear in the preview box at the top. You can either copy the generated shortcode, or click on ‘Insert Icon’ (if on the post or page edit screens)

How to Get Support if I need some help?

We only provide prompt support for Pro version, if you benefit or enjoy Cootheme Icons plugin, please consider upgrading to the Pro version of this plugin for top notch customer support.

If you do not want to upgrade to the Pro version, you can post your message in our forum. Pro version customers will get priority access to the support.
